articles.title: Former officer who murdered George Floyd learns fate today at sentencing - CBC.ca
articles.description: Former Minneapolis police officer Derek Chauvin learns his sentence Friday for murder in George Floyd' s death, closing a chapter in a case that sparked global outrage and a reckoning on racial disparities in America.
